"Assault Rifle":
"An Assault Rifle is a long-range weapon that you can use to shoot enemies from a distance while staying on the move.

The damage you deal varies depending on your distance to the enemy. If you're too close or too far, you will deal less damage, so try to maintain the optimal distance from the enemy to deal maximum damage."

"The PA \"Raging Shot\" fires an explosive round that damages a single enemy.

When charged, the shot is able to pierce through multiple enemies, so keep an eye on enemy positioning when deciding which variant to use."
